{"id":1441792772,"question_id":1302,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1730642415,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"34 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1441792772/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Characters to Make Fancy String","memory":"42.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeFancyString(string s) {\n        \n        if(s.length() < 3){\n            return s;\n        }\n\n        string out = \"\";\n        int len = 0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            if(i<2){\n                out += s[i];\n                len++;\n            }\n            else{\n                if(s[i]==out[len-1] && s[i]==out[len-2]){\n                    continue;\n                }\n                else{\n                    out += s[i];\n                    len++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return out;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-characters-to-make-fancy-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
